startMessage: Hello! I'm HotelAssist bot for Edem Resort Medical & SPA. How can I help you?

bookingProcess.invalidDateFormat: The format is incorrect or the date is in the past. Please, try again.
bookingProcess.enterCheckoutDate: Please, write a checkout date. The format should be DD/MM/YYYY
bookingProcess.checkoutEarlierThanCheckin: The checkout date cannot be earlier or equal the check-in date. Please, try again.
bookingProcess.invalidFirstName: Invalid first name. Please, try again.
bookingProcess.invalidLastName: Invalid last name. Please, try again.
bookingProcess.invalidPhoneNumber: Invalid phone number. Please, try again.
bookingProcess.bookingConfirmation: Booking confirmed! Room: {{roomType}}. Check-in: {{checkIn}}, Check-out: {{checkOut}}, Total nights: {{totalDays}}. Total price: {{totalPrice}} UAH. Name: {{firstName}} {{lastName}}, Phone: {{phone}}. You can pay at the reception in the day of your arrival.
bookingProcess.noRoomsAvailable: Something went wrong and this room type was not found. Please, reach our manager +380673146512 to fix your problem.
bookingProcess.enterCheckInDate: Write a check-in date. The format should be DD/MM/YYYY
bookingProcess.sharePhoneNumber: We need your phone number to complete the booking. Please share it via the button below.
bookingProcess.shareContact: Share your contact to continue reservation.
bookingProcess.noContactInfoReceived: No contact info received. Please, share your contact to continue reservation.
bookingProcess.bookingError: Seems like some error happened during booking. Please, try again to book the room.
bookingProcess.errorOccurred: We are sorry to tell that some error happened during booking. Please, try again or reach to our manager directly +380673146512
bookingProcess.roomUnavailable: Room {{roomType}} is unavailable in that dates. You can book {{roomType}} room from {{nextAvailableDate}} or look at other rooms.
bookingProcess.roomNotFound: No room found with such id: {{roomId}}

extraServices.selectService: Please, select a service you are interested in to continue.
extraServices.selectCategory: Please, select a category for {{serviceName}} service.
extraServices.recoveryAndDetectionOfDiseaseRisks: Recovery and detection of disease risks
